Sorry, i didn\'t understand you. Try saying it again!

You need to complete both fields first

- Record audio: It\'s necessary for the assistant to hear you voice and recognize what you are saying
- Calendar: We need this permission to add events to your calendar
Please, tap the button below to grant the permissions to continue using the application
I\'ve added \'%s\' to the shopping list \'%s\'
There is no item here. Try to say \"add new item\" to create the first one!
The last action on %s has been undone
There are no items to delete
There are no events for the selected date.
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
%s was not found, therefore it can\'t be deleted
Press back again to exit the application

List of commands:

 - create/add: 
 			 - task
 			 - shopping list
 			 - event: The assistant expects the date on the following formats:
 						 - 1st of April (of) 2020 at 16:30/4:30pm
 						 - April 1st 2020 at 16:30/4:30pm
 						 - in 5 days/hours/minutes/seconds

 			 You can say cancel anytime while adding a new item. 

 - show/open my:
 			 - events
 			 - tasks
 			 - shopping lists

 - undo last action: This command undo last performed action on tasks or shopping lists. Is not available for events yet.


While on a list or while in the calendar you can use this commands:
 			 - add/create name
 			 - rename/edit name to new name
 			 - delete/remove/erase name
 			 - enter/open name (only in shopping lists)
 			 - delete all (not available with events)
